title: 'Big Short' investor Michael Burry says AI is turning Big Tech into a worse business
full_text: 'Big Short' investor Michael Burry says AI is turning Big Tech into a worse business. Michael Burry, the investor from "The Big Short," said return on invested capital is the "measure to beat all measures" when looking at AI companies..
